Step1.Aupied: At the foot of the truck
Step1.Info: Pack your items, our drivers transport them carefully in the truck, secured by straps and blankets.

Step3.desc: For accurate billing, choose a similar item from the search. If the item is not found, select a similar size from the list. Contact us for any questions.

Step4.camion: At the foot of the truck

sansAide.desc1: Ideal for small parcels or boxes you can lift on your own without assistance.
sansAide.desc2: Upon arrival, the driver will place the parcels at the foot of the truck for your convenience.

avecAide.desc1: Choose this option if you have heavier or bulkier parcels that require assistance.
avecAide.desc2: 2 handlers will be available to help you load/unload your parcels safely.

Step5.alert: Please accept the terms and conditions
Step5.description: Your order has been successfully placed.

ACCEUILE.description: Hezli is your trusted partner as a delivery service provider. We are committed to offering fast, reliable, and secure service. Thanks to remarkable efficiency, we deliver your items in an impressive time frame. We adhere to rigorous safety standards where each delivery step is carefully monitored to ensure the integrity of your items. With Hezli, you benefit from a comprehensive delivery solution, where your items are in the qualified hands of our team.

Delai.title: Fast Delivery
Delai.desc: Our drivers are at your service within an hour based on the address you provided.

Coût.title: Advanced Technology
Coût.desc: Explore our technological expertise and dive into the use of our innovative application.

ÉTAPES.desc: Discover our service designed to offer you an exceptional delivery experience every time.

etap1.title: BE HAPPY
etap1.desc: Delighted with our exceptional service, exceeding your transport needs.

etap2.title: LOAD
etap2.desc: We ensure quick and accurate collection of items.

etap3.title: DELIVER
etap3.desc: Count on our efficient and reliable team for fast and secure delivery.

etap4.title: ORDER
etap4.desc: Facilitate your Transport Order in just a few clicks.

PRESTATION-SERVICE-1.desc: Stay informed with our mobile app and website. Effortlessly book your truck via our online platform. Our simple form on the app or website ensures quick and secure booking.

PRESTATION-SERVICE-3.desc: Explore the wide range of our customized moving services, carefully adjusted to meet your specific needs.

PRESTATION-SERVICE-2.desc: Choose Hezli and experience exceptional delivery; fast deliveries, attentive assistance, and peace of mind.

card1.title: Store Delivery
card1.desc: You can pick up your deliveries from one of our stores.

card3.title: Parcel Transport
card3.desc: Fast delivery within exceptionally short deadlines.

card4.title: Movers Only
card4.desc: Do you only need movers? Count on us.

card5.title: Apartment Moving
card5.desc: Every family has unique moving needs. Our professional movers are here for you.

card6.title: Office Moving
card6.desc: We know how crucial moving your office is, but don't worry, we handle everything masterfully.

TÉLÉCHARGER.desc: Simplify your transport experience with the Hezli app. Book, track, and manage deliveries effortlessly. Start now and enjoy seamless logistics at your fingertips.

CONTACT.desc: Do you have questions or need assistance? Contact our friendly team today. We're here to help and provide you with the information you need.

COMMENCER.desc: Sign up on our website or app and discover seamless logistic solutions for all your transport needs. Join Hezli today.

Apropos.desc: Explore our exceptional transport offers in France, precise and efficient logistic solutions to meet your expectations.

NOTRE-COMPARE.desc: Hezli is a delivery company specialized in transporting a wide range of items, including documents, office supplies, packaged products, fragile items, furniture, and equipment. We offer this service to businesses from various sectors as well as individuals in Île-de-France. With our competent and dedicated team, we ensure the safety and timeliness of your parcels. Whether it's a small package or a massive shipment, Hezli is committed to delivering your items safely and on schedule.

DEMENAGEMENT.Paragraph: Fast secure delivery. Very good courteous
DEMENAGEMENT.Para: and polite driver satisfied I will not hesitate to use your services again.

Header.desc: Dedicated and competent professionals - Committed to providing smooth and reliable transport services.

Nos-Service.title2: Our Expertise Follows You Every Step!
Nos-Service.desc: Whether it's around the corner or across the country, our competent team offers you a smooth and stress-free experience.

ABOUT-SERVICE.desc1: We are proud to present our comprehensive range of transport services, designed to meet your varied needs. Guided by our commitment to excellence, we provide reliable and efficient solutions to ensure smooth transport for your shipments.
ABOUT-SERVICE.desc2: From collection to delivery; whether you have light, heavy, or specialized parcels, our team is ready to handle everything by adopting the most appropriate logistics strategies. We carefully handle each step, offering much more than just a service.

ÉTAPES-FACILES.desc: Our approach aims to offer you a fully satisfying experience! Contact us and get a quote in a blink of an eye.

etap1.title: ORDER
etap1.desc: Easily place your transport order in a few clicks.

etap2.title: DELIVER
etap2.desc: Trust our efficient and reliable team for safe and fast delivery.

etap3.title: PICK UP
etap3.desc: Fast and careful collection of items for flawless transport.

etap4.title: BE HAPPY
etap4.desc: Delighted with our exceptional service, surpassing your transport needs.

SERVICE.desc1: We strive to create an inclusive experience, where each step of our process is meticulously arranged to ensure an unparalleled level of accuracy. From collecting items to delivery, we put in place rigorous protocols to ensure seamless execution. Whether you have questions, queries, or simply need information, our contact system allows you to reach us seamlessly. Sign up, drop us a line, or just give us a call!

HEZLI-CONTACT.desc: Contact us today to discuss your transport needs. Our friendly team is ready to assist you and provide personalized solutions.

ContactForm.desc: Contact us directly, by phone, or fill out the form to receive a free consultation from our enthusiastic staff.
